arts.ttl: Fiorentina vs. Lecce to escape the danger zone
arts.sum: There have been 20 official meetings between the sides in Tuscany: 11 Fiorentina wins (most recent 1–0 in last season’s Serie A), five draws (most recent 2–2 in 2023/24) and four Lecce victories (most recent 1–0 in 2019/20). Fiorentina are still without a win in Serie A 2025/26 after nine matchdays.
Serie A is providing intriguing narratives at the top and bottom of the table and Elliott Bretland has correct-score picks for all ten Serie A matches this weekend.
